Race.SpecificTitle: Justice of the Peace -- Justice of the Peace District  4
Recall Mitchell Lewis -- Alderman, District C, City of Mansfield
Race.SummaryText:
SPECIAL ELECTION

FOR THE RECALL OF

MITCHELL LEWIS

ALDERMAN, DISTRICT C, CITY OF MANSFIELD
Race.FullText:
SPECIAL ELECTION

FOR THE RECALL OF

MITCHELL LEWIS

ALDERMAN, DISTRICT C, CITY OF MANSFIELD

FOR the Recall		o

AGAINST the Recall	o

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Tax Continuation -- 1.26 Mills Continuation - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of DeSoto, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), levy a special tax of one and twenty-six hundredths (1.26) mills on all property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $852,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, for the purpose of maintaining and operating the DeSoto Parish Courthouse and Courthouse Annex, said millage to represent a twenty-four hundredths of a mill (.24) increase over the 1.02 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2017 pursuant to an election held on February 9, 2008?

Race.SpecificTitle: Village of Grand Cane Prop. No. 1 -- 5.18 Mills Renewal - Mayor & BOA - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Village of Grand Cane Propositions
Proposition No. 1
(Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Village of Grand Cane of the Parish of DeSoto, State of Louisiana (the "Village"), levy a tax of five and eighteen hundredths (5.18) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the Village of Grand Cane, an estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one entire year being $7,355, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, for the purpose of operating, maintaining and improving the sewerage system of the Village and maintaining and improving the public streets in the Village?

Race.SpecificTitle: Village of Grand Cane Prop. No. 2 -- 4.81 Mills Renewal - Mayor & BOA - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Village of Grand Cane Propositions
Proposition No. 2
(Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Village of Grand Cane of the Parish of DeSoto, State of Louisiana (the "Village"), levy a tax of four and eighty-one hundredths (4.81) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the Village of Grand Cane, an estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one entire year being $6,830, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, for the purpose of operating, maintaining and improving the sewerage system of the Village?

Race.SpecificTitle: City of Mansfield Prop. No. 1 -- Wet/Dry-6%PkgAlcoh. - M&BOA
Race.SummaryText:
City of Mansfield Propositions
Proposition No. 1
Race.FullText: Shall the sale of beverages of alcoholic content containing not more than six percent alcohol by volume be permitted by package only and not for consumption on the premises in the City of Mansfield, State of Louisiana?

Race.SpecificTitle: City of Mansfield Prop. No. 2 -- Wet/Dry-6%ConAlcoh. - M&BOA
Race.SummaryText:
City of Mansfield Propositions
Proposition No. 2
Race.FullText: Shall the sale of beverages of alcoholic content containing not more than six percent alcohol by volume for consumption on the premises be permitted in the City of Mansfield, State of Louisiana?

Race.SpecificTitle: City of Mansfield Prop. No. 3 -- Wet/Dry-1/2%ConAlcoh. - M&BOA
Race.SummaryText:
City of Mansfield Propositions
Proposition No. 3
Race.FullText: Shall the sale of beverage alcohol containing one-half of one percent alcohol by volume and above for consumption on the premises be permitted in the City of Mansfield, State of Louisiana?

Race.SpecificTitle: City of Mansfield Prop. No. 4 -- Wet/Dry-1/2%PkgAlcoh. - M&BOA
Race.SummaryText:
City of Mansfield Propositions
Proposition No. 4
Race.FullText: Shall the sale of beverages of alcoholic content containing one-half of one percent alcohol by volume and above by the package only and not for consumption on the premises be permitted in the City of Mansfield, State of Louisiana?

Race.SpecificTitle: City of Mansfield Prop. No. 5 -- Wet/Dry-Restaurant - M&BOA
Race.SummaryText:
City of Mansfield Propositions
Proposition No. 5
Race.FullText: Shall the sale of beverages of high and low alcoholic content be permitted only on the premises of restaurant establishments which have been issued an "R" permit as defined by law in the City of Mansfield, State of Louisiana?

Race.SpecificTitle: Waterworks Dist. No. 1 -- .99 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall Waterworks District No. 1 of the Parish of DeSoto, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a ninety-nine hundredths (.99) of a mill tax on all property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $738,000 expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of maintaining, operating and improving the District's waterworks system, including property, equipment and facilities necessary therefor?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protection Dist. 5 -- 10 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District 5 of the Parish of DeSoto, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of ten (10) mills on property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $420,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating fire protection and emergency medical equipment and facilities in the District, including purchasing fire trucks and other fire fighting and emergency equipment and paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes?
